ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: INCLUDES(PIF_Module__c,'Hotel Only') && OR(INCLUDES(PIF_Module__c,'Passenger Detail'),INCLUDES(PIF_Module__c,'Passenger Detail'), INCLUDES(PIF_Module__c,'Passenger Address'), INCLUDES(PIF_Module__c,'Passenger Passport'), INCLUDES(PIF_Module__c,'Requests'), INCLUDES(PIF_Module__c,'Emergency Contact'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PIF Module cannot be Hotel Only with some other value
